    • About Scott Fuller


    I’m a full time real estate broker with over 17 years experience in the industry. Consistently ranked in the top 1% for closed sales in the East Bay, we specialize in helping homeowners sell their home for the most money and in the shortest time. My full service team includes dedicated buyers agents, full time marketing experts and more. We use some of the most cutting edge marketing available to help get you top dollar for your home. My background and education in information systems, web programming and technology sets me apart from other real estate professionals.
